scripts.deploy-saveLatestRates: gcloud functions deploy saveLatestRates --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-http --env-vars-file .env.yaml --region europe-west2
scripts.deploy-getRates: gcloud functions deploy getRates --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-http --env-vars-file .env.yaml --region europe-west2
scripts.create-db: gcloud deployment-manager deployments create plutus --template create-db.jinja
